members.joinCircumstances: One of Enel's four priests responsible for the Ordeal of Balls with 10% survival rate
Introduced as one of Enel's four priests responsible for the Ordeal of String with 3% survival rate

keyMoments.title: Satori Battles Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Priest Satori continues to demonstrate the power of God's Army by overwhelming three Straw Hat Pirates simultaneously using Mantra and Impact Dials.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the formidable strength of Enel's priests and why they are feared throughout Skypiea.

keyMoments.title: Shura Arrives
keyMoments.description: Priest Shura arrives at the Going Merry on behalf of God's Army to eliminate sacrifices.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces another member of God's Army and expands understanding of their reach and power.

keyMoments.title: Crew Split Across Trials
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats remain separated across Upper Yard, with Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp fighting Satori while Chopper guards the ship alone.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's vulnerability when separated and facing overwhelming odds in unfamiliar territory.

keyMoments.title: Chopper Calls for Outside Help
keyMoments.description: Unable to handle Priest Shura alone, Chopper calls Gan Fall for assistance, showing the crew's willingness to accept help when necessary.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that the Straw Hats recognize when they need allies, foreshadowing their alliance with Gan Fall.

ships.description: The crew's ship, currently anchored in the White Sea and defended by Chopper

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
